channel.title: Item making you donator REP++

item.title: Item making you donator REP++
item.dc:creator: @Primate Primate
item.description:
@Primate wrote:

hi i want a item to make you donator when you click it

if (itemId == 10943) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(10943, 1);
c.isdonator = 1;
c.logout();
}

so far thats what i got, the item is a reward token
first click option is “look-at”

when i click it, it does nothing, any help? REP++

Read full topic
